reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we stayed here 13/14 august to attend a wedding at Sandhurst. During our holiday we also stayed at the Holiday Inn, Holiday inn Express, Novotel, Kyriad and another private hotel and I have to say that the bed/sleep I had in this hotel was the best.
reviews.title: Very Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are clean and tidy - with new TV and room trim all round. Tea and coffee available plus vending machines at reception. The food next door was very good and very quick - I was suprised at the service as the place was packed on Friday night but food came quickly and service very attentive.
reviews.title: The Noise Problem will have to be sorted out

reviews.text: Previous reviews mentioned noise from outside - not an issue in our room although we DID have a ground floor room and we heard some noise from the people in the room above as they moved about.....
reviews.title: No nonsense and good value for money
